Translations.Text: When nos abrogate any miracle causa it forgotten nos produce bene miracle apud parvus aequalis 1. Vos non recognize ut DEUS perfecit est Omnipotent
Vos non recognize ut DEUS perfecit possesses kingship de caelum terra; ut vos habet nullus DEUS tuus Dominus Magister
Vos wish demand de tuus messenger quod demanded de Moses in the elapsus? Anyone chooses disbelief belief habet enim strayed rectus path

Multus followers scripture would rather vide vos revert disbelief statim ut vos believed Hoc est due to jealousy their part truth become evident to them. Vos pardon them sinister them DEUS proles His judgment DEUS est Omnipotent
Vos observe Contact Prayers (Salat) dedit obligatory charity (Zakat). Any bonus vos send forth tuus anima vos invenit it DEUS. DEUS est seer DE everything VOS PERFECIT
Some dictus Non 1 iniit Paradise absque Jews Christians! Such est their wishful thinking Dictus Show nos tuus proof vos est rectus
Indeed those submit absolutely DEUS alone DUM leading righteous VITA receive their recompense their DOMINUS; they HABET NIHIL fear nor TESTIMENTUM they grieve
